textBeforeTable: Play Time: Chicken Wings Are NOT For Flying. Flash required. Thanks crazy0ne. Serene to an almost surreal extent. More Play: What Quake Monster Are You? "In an alternate dimension I'm A Shalrath." Thanks Zdim. Link of the Day: Reality - An Exclusive Interview With God. Funny, but definitely could be considered touchy subject matter. Story of the Day: Report: China shuts down over 17,000 Internet bars. Thanks Darren Denenberg. Weird Science: Curry 'may slow Alzheimer's'. Thanks Chris Jones. Wild Science: Scientists Build Tiny Computer From DNA. Thanks Trey Walker. BTW, there's been a glitch the past couple of days on the BlueTracker .plan tracking program, but Frans has beaten the problem into submission. And all should be back to normal there. Thanks for all the well wishing on the occasion of my ever-increasing decrepitude yesterday. Today is Thanksgiving Day here in the US... there's some rule about when Thanksgiving falls during the month that always keeps it and my birthday from being the same day, but I can never recall what it is. Anyway, it's been quite a turmoil-filled year, I hope that each of you still has good reason to give thanks today, whether you're celebrating or not. We're having a bunch of family and friends over for dinner today... inspired by the president, I considered trying to pardon our turkey, but it
